. The town is situated at the mouth of the Restigouche River on the Bay of Chaleur, known for its snowfall in the winters and as a secret summer paradise. Tourists are surprised at the long stretches of natural beaches and scenic vistas.

Lots to do in Dalhousie, go for a walk on the beach at Inch arran.
Winter activities include snowmobiling, skiing, snow-shoeing. Summertime includes salmon fishing on the world famous Restigouche River and its tributaries.
